sentences.en: A lack of prudence may lead to financial problems.
sentences.cn: 不够谨慎可能会导致财政上出现问题。

sentences.en: Britain has warned travellers to exercise prudence and care.
sentences.cn: 英国已经警告游客要谨慎小心。

sentences.en: But this was only from a sense of prudence : he took no pleasure in it.
sentences.cn: 可是这只是一些 小心谨慎,不是一种快乐.

sentences.en: His prudence is parallel to his zeal.
sentences.cn: 他固然谨慎,也同样热心.

sentences.en: How becoming to aged is wisdom, understanding and prudence to the venerable!
sentences.cn: 老年人富有智慧;有荣名的人, 聪明而有智谋,何其相称!

sentences.en: It is best to err on the side of prudence.
Oh, now it was too late for prudence.
sentences.cn: 啊, 现在小心谨慎还有什么用?

sentences.en: Prudence applied principles to particular issues.
sentences.cn: 把原则应用在特殊问题上是深谋远虑的.

sentences.en: Taylor has too much prudence to gamble.
sentences.cn: 泰勒为人谨慎小心,不会去投机冒险.

sentences.en: The happy impute all their success to prudence or merit.
sentences.cn: 幸运者都把他们的成功归因于谨慎或功德.

sentences.en: Their attitude expressed a final reserve and their faces showed the glaze of prudence.
sentences.cn: 她们的姿态十分拘谨,脸上流露出小心翼翼的神色.

sentences.en: They dignified cowardice by calling it prudence.
sentences.cn: 他们把怯懦美其名曰为谨慎.

sentences.en: This common prudence should have now induced him to omit.
sentences.cn: 按通常的审慎做法,他本来应该免掉这件事的.

sentences.en: We don't marry for passion, but for prudence and for establishment.
sentences.cn: 我们结婚不是为了爱情,是为了前途,为了成家立业.

sentences.en: When Della reached home her intoxication gave way a little to prudence and reason.
sentences.cn: 德拉回家之后,她的狂喜有点儿变得审慎和理智了.

trans.tran_en: a sensible and careful attitude that makes you avoid unnecessary risks
